com.opengamma.strata.calc.marketdata

Interface MarketDataFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMarketDataFactory

    public interface MarketDataFactory
    A market data factory build market data. It can source observable data from a data provider and it can also build higher level market data, for example calibrated curves or volatility surfaces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MarketEnvironment buildMarketData(MarketDataRequirements requirements, CalculationEnvironment suppliedData, MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig)
      Builds a set of market data.
      MarketEnvironment buildMarketData(MarketDataRequirements requirements, CalculationEnvironment suppliedData, MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig, ScenarioDefinition scenarioDefinition)
      Builds the market data required for performing calculations for a set of scenarios.

    • Method Detail

      • buildMarketData

        MarketEnvironment buildMarketData(MarketDataRequirements requirements,
                                  CalculationEnvironment suppliedData,
                                  MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig)
        Builds a set of market data.

        If the requirements include any data not provided in the suppliedData it is built by the engine.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the market data required for the calculations
        suppliedData - market data supplied by the user
        marketDataConfig - configuration needed to build non-observable market data, for example curves or surfaces
        Returns:
        the market data required by the calculations plus details of any data that could not be built

      • buildMarketData

        MarketEnvironment buildMarketData(MarketDataRequirements requirements,
                                  CalculationEnvironment suppliedData,
                                  MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig,
                                  ScenarioDefinition scenarioDefinition)
        Builds the market data required for performing calculations for a set of scenarios.

        If the calculations require any data not provided in the suppliedData it is built by the engine before applying the scenario definition.

        If the scenario definition contains perturbations that apply to the inputs used to build market data, the data must be built by this method, not provided in suppliedData.

        For example, if a perturbation is defined that shocks the par rates used to build a curve, the curve must not be provided in suppliedData. The engine will only build the curve using the par rates if it is not found in suppliedData.

        Parameters:
        requirements - the market data required for the calculations
        suppliedData - the base market data used to derive the data for each scenario
        marketDataConfig - configuration needed to build non-observable market data, for example curves or surfaces
        scenarioDefinition - defines how the market data for each scenario is derived from the base data
        Returns:
        the market data required by the calculations
